name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Duel Terminal 6
summary: The Duel Terminal was designed by Konami to assist in introducing the then new Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's anime to new and existing players. The Duel Terminal itself looks like a traditional arcade machine and has a variety of game modes, using cards from the Yu-Gi-Oh! Official Card Game. Players can either use a Deck chosen by the system, or the Duelist can use his/her own cards.
